data.content:
noun
[singular] an occurrence in which a horse wins a series of three major races
a horse that won the first leg of the Triple Crown
baseball :the achievement of a baseball player who at the end of a season leads the league in batting average, home runs, and runs batted in
Who was the last player to win the Triple Crown in the American League?
or triple crown :a set of three major awards, wins, or achievements in a particular field
